name: AppGroup
summary: Injected podspec used by CocoaPods-AppGroup plugin.
description:
This is intended to be used as an injected podspec template 
 used by the [CocoaPods-ApGroup plugin](https://github.com/mzp/cocoapods-app_group).

 It should *not* be referenced outside of that context.
